description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity for an Android app using Jetpack Compose. It sets up the theme, a Surface container, and a simple NavHost with a placeholder route. Additionally, it includes a Composable function to display a placeholder screen message.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity of the SmartHome TV Dashboard app, responsible for initializing Jetpack Compose UI and setting up navigation.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the Compose UI content, sets up the theme, Surface, and a placeholder NavHost for future navigation.

methods.name: PlaceholderScreen
methods.description: A composable function that displays a message indicating successful migration to Compose.
